name: TV Box Space Kid Running Game
name_original: TV Box Space Kid Running Game
description:
TV Box Space Kid Running Game is a unique 3D Endless Running Game super fun to play. 

Play as an Astronaut Kid exploring various Alien planets filled with Giant Monsters and Dinosaurs.

Game Features: 

- Super Fun and addictive gameplay.

- Plays on Mobile Devices and Android TV Box (Play with Android TV Remote Control - No Gamepad is Required).

- Colorful and unique 3D Worlds to explore.

Beautiful 3D Alien Worlds awaits to be explored.
